comprehensive_overview: LibYAML is a YAML 1.1 parser and emitter written in C. It is a library for parsing and emitting YAML data. YAML is a human-readable data serialization format that is commonly used for configuration files and data exchange between languages. LibYAML allows developers to integrate YAML support into their applications.
core_features: Parsing YAML data into a native data structure
Emitting native data structures into valid YAML documents
Written in C for portability and efficiency
